returns._0: The address of the active custodial.

params.contentId: The ID of the content to assign.
params.distributor: The address of the distributor to assign the content to.
params.encryptedData: Additional encrypted data to share access between authorized parties.

getCustodial(uint256).notice: Retrieves the custodial address for the given content ID and ensures it is active.

grantCustodial(uint256,address,bytes).notice: Assigns distribution rights over the content.
